Academy Award-nominated British character actor '''Tom Wilkinson''' (born 1948) has stated that he was offered a part in [[The Lord of the Rings (film series)|''The Lord of the Rings'' (film series)]], but turned it down because he would have had to spend a year in [[New Zealand]]. 

He was not asked for a specific part; he turned the opportunity down prior to the casting of characters.
